Articles.Content:
So I distinctly recall that I could this before, but for some reason now I can't.

 

When selecting a target (say a stranded Kerbal in orbit) from the map screen, I used to be able to see the TARGET icon in the main staging window when getting closer. But now I can't see it anymore? This makes rendezvousing quite difficult now.
Try hitting F4.  That toggles the visibility of those indicators on the main view.
And if you mean the markers on the navball click the top centre to cycle through orbit, surface and target.

I don't mean the Navball.

 

Thanks ElWanderer, F4 did it for me !
Glad you found it. I mentioned the navball just to be sure. Many new players do not realize you can cycle through several modes.

There is also a "show labels" setting in the game options.

Maybe your setting is "off" by default.
